entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %

Dewpoint: -13.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
